pages.text: Philosophical thoughts swirling around? Want to see things from a different perspective? To view them in a new light? It's time to prepare Golden Carrot Soup! $(br)Except for a few ingredients, it closely mirrors the recipe for regular chicken soup. This dish grants all the benefits of the golden carrot to those who consume it, much like the potion brewed from it.

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: Rumor has it that this soup is the supper of spies and assassins who operate under the cover of night. Practical folks, indeed.
